metaTags.metaDescription: Join Cloudflare in the presentation of speed improvements

resourceList.title: Speed Week - Follow up
resourceList.resourceTitle: Two Weeks Later: Finding and Eliminating Long Tail Latencies
resourceList.description: A little over two weeks ago, we shared extensive benchmarking results of edge networks around the world, and made a commitment that we would improve in 10% of networks where we were not #1.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Welcome - Welcome to Speed Week 2021
resourceList.resourceTitle: Welcome to Speed Week 2021
resourceList.description: Make your internet faster than the speed of light. Tune in as we announce exciting new products, updates, and how we developed our own like-for-like testing tool to measure performance across the Internet.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Press Release: Cloudflare Grows its Network By 25 Percent to Speed Up and Secure the Internet
resourceList.resourceTitle: Press Release: Cloudflare Grows its Network By 25 Percent to Speed Up and Secure the Internet
resourceList.description: Cloudflare has announced that we have grown our global network by 25% to more than 250 cities in over 100 countries in the last two years.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Cloudflare Passes 250 Cities, Triples External Network Capacity, 8x-es Backbone
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Passes 250 Cities, Triples External Network Capacity, 8x-es Backbone
resourceList.description: Today, I have three speedy infrastructure updates: we've passed 250 on-network cities, more than tripled our external network capacity, and increased our long-haul internal backbone network by over 800% since the start of 2020.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Welcome to Speed Week
resourceList.resourceTitle: Welcome to Speed Week
resourceList.description: Join Rustam Lalkaka (Director of Product, Cloudflare) and Marc Lamik (Director of Product, Cloudflare) for an Speed Week fireside chat.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Vary for Images: Serve the Correct Images to the Correct Browsers
resourceList.resourceTitle: Vary for Images: Serve the Correct Images to the Correct Browsers
resourceList.description: We're excited to announce support for Vary, an HTTP header that ensures different content types can be served to user-agents with differing capabilities.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Speed Week: Workers and Cloudflare Network Expansion
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Workers and Cloudflare Network Expansion
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss how we are expanding our network and for an exciting update on our Workers product!

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Monday - 21-09-13 - Cloudflare Workers: the Fast Serverless Platform
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Workers: the Fast Serverless Platform
resourceList.description: Today, Workers is 30% faster than it was three years ago at P90. And it is 210% faster than Lambda@Edge, and 298% faster than Lambda.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Speed Week: Signed Exchanges, Early Hints, and Tiered Caching
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Signed Exchanges, Early Hints, and Tiered Caching
resourceList.description: Join our product management team as they discuss Signed Exchanges, Early Hints, and Tiered Caching!

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Speed Week: Live-Updating Analytics and Instant Logs
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Live-Updating Analytics and Instant Logs
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss Live-Updating Analytics and Instant Logs

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Improving Origin Performance for Everyone with Orpheus and Tiered Cache
resourceList.resourceTitle: Improving Origin Performance for Everyone with Orpheus and Tiered Cache
resourceList.description: Building a better Internet means helping build more reliable and efficient services that everyone can use.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - From AMP to Signed Exchanges, Or How Innovation Happens at Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: From AMP to Signed Exchanges, Or How Innovation Happens at Cloudflare
resourceList.description: This is the story of how we decided to work with Google to build Signed Exchanges support at Cloudflare. But, more generally, it's also a story of how Cloudflare thinks about building disruptive new products.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Data at Cloudflare just got a lot faster: Announcing Live-updating Analytics and Instant Logs
resourceList.resourceTitle: Data at Cloudflare just got a lot faster: Announcing Live-updating Analytics and Instant Logs
resourceList.description: Today, we're excited to introduce Live-updating Analytics and Instant Logs. For Pro, Business, and Enterprise customers, our analytics dashboards now update in real time. In addition to this, Enterprise customers can now view their HTTP request logs instantly in the Cloudflare dashboard.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - How we built Instant Logs
resourceList.resourceTitle: How we built Instant Logs
resourceList.description: In this blog post, we'll show you how we built a new system that can give you access to your Cloudflare logs in real time, with just a single click.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Argo 2.0: Smart Routing Learns New Tricks
resourceList.resourceTitle: Argo 2.0: Smart Routing Learns New Tricks
resourceList.description: Starting today, all Free, Pro, and Business plan Argo customers will see improved performance with no additional configuration or charge.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Tuesday - 21-09-14 - Improve site load times and SEO with one-click support for Signed Exchanges on Google Search
resourceList.resourceTitle: Improve site load times and SEO with one-click support for Signed Exchanges on Google Search
resourceList.description: Starting today, Cloudflare customers will be able to generate Signed Exchanges (SXG) for Google Search with just one click.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Building Cloudflare Images in Rust and Cloudflare Workers
resourceList.resourceTitle: Building Cloudflare Images in Rust and Cloudflare Workers
resourceList.description: Using Rust and Cloudflare Workers helps us quickly iterate and deliver product improvements over the coming weeks and months.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Discovering what's slowing down your website with Web Analytics
resourceList.resourceTitle: Discovering what's slowing down your website with Web Analytics
resourceList.description: Cloudflare Web Analytics makes essential web analytics, such as the top-performing pages on your website and top referrers, available to everyone for free, and it's becoming more powerful than ever.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Optimizing images on the web
resourceList.resourceTitle: Optimizing images on the web
resourceList.description: A detailed breakdown of how best to optimize images for the web, a new tool to test a webpage's image performance, and explanation of how Cloudflare Images can help to improve your website's image experience.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Cloudflare Images Now Available to Everyone
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Images Now Available to Everyone
resourceList.description: Today, we are launching Cloudflare Images for all customers. Images provides a single product to store, resize and serve images. We built Cloudflare Images, so customers of all sizes can build a scalable and affordable image pipeline with a fraction of the effort.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Speed Week: Web Analytics
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Web Analytics
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss Web Analytics

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - Speed Week: Cloudflare Images
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Cloudflare Images
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss our newest release, Cloudflare Images!

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Wednesday - How Cloudflare Images can make your life easier
resourceList.resourceTitle: How Cloudflare Images can make your life easier
resourceList.description: Are you tired of buckets and non ending egress fees? Cloudflare Images can help you to create and maintain your entire image pipeline.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Press Release: Cloudflare To Speed Up Millions of Websites, Automatically and For Free
resourceList.resourceTitle: Press Release: Cloudflare To Speed Up Millions of Websites, Automatically and For Free
resourceList.description: New technology can help browsers make the Internet 30% faster

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Magic makes your network faster
resourceList.resourceTitle: Magic makes your network faster
resourceList.description: Today, as part of Speed Week, we'll break down the other side of the Magic: how using Cloudflare can automatically make your entire network faster.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Early Hints: How Cloudflare Can Improve Website Load Times by 30%
resourceList.resourceTitle: Early Hints: How Cloudflare Can Improve Website Load Times by 30%
resourceList.description: Today, Cloudflare is announcing support for Early Hints. Early Hints takes advantage of "server think time" to asynchronously send instructions to the browser to begin loading resources while the origin server is compiling the full response, which can improve page load time by 30%.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Cloudflare Backbone: A Fast Lane on the Busy Internet Highway
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Backbone: A Fast Lane on the Busy Internet Highway
resourceList.description: It's important that our network continues to help bring improved performance and resiliency to the Internet. To accomplish this, we built our own backbone.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - The Zero Trust platform built for speed
resourceList.resourceTitle: The Zero Trust platform built for speed
resourceList.description: Cloudflare Zero Trust secures your company's users, devices, and data — without slowing you down. Your team should not need to sacrifice performance in order to be secure.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Speed Week: Customer Cloudversations
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Customer Cloudversations
resourceList.description: During this special Speed Week edition of Customer Cloudversations, Joel Snook from Blackboard Learning will discuss Blackboard's experience with Cloudflare and the industry as a whole.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Speed Week: Built for Speed: Zero Trust and Magic Transit
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Built for Speed: Zero Trust and Magic Transit
resourceList.description: Join Annika Garbers (Product Manager, Cloudflare) and Sam Rhea (Director of Product Management, Cloudflare) as they discuss our newest updates to Cloudflare One and Magic Transit!

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Speed Week: Early Hints, Global Backbone, and Last Mile Networking
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Early Hints, Global Backbone, and Last Mile Networking
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss our newest releases, Early Hints, Global Backbone, and Last Mile Networking.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Thursday - Unboxing the Last Mile: Introducing Last Mile Insights
resourceList.resourceTitle: Unboxing the Last Mile: Introducing Last Mile Insights
resourceList.description: The last 20% of the work requires 80% of the effort." The Pareto Principle applies in many domains — nowhere more so on the Internet, however, than on the Last Mile.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Friday - Announcing Project Turpentine: an easy way to get off Varnish
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing Project Turpentine: an easy way to get off Varnish
resourceList.description: Project Turpentine is the easiest way to replicate a varnish configuration on Cloudflare. Just export your full VCL from another provider and use Turpentine to move to a TypeScript-based runtime for varnish on Cloudflare Workers.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Friday - Benchmarking Edge Network Performance: Akamai, Cloudflare, AWS CloudFront, Fastly, and Google
resourceList.resourceTitle: Benchmarking Edge Network Performance: Akamai, Cloudflare, AWS CloudFront, Fastly, and Google
resourceList.description: We recently ran a measurement experiment where we used Real User Measurement (RUM) data from the standard browser API to test the performance of Cloudflare and others in real-world conditions across the globe.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Friday - Speed Week: Project Turpentine, RUM Speed Tests
resourceList.resourceTitle: Speed Week: Project Turpentine, RUM Speed Tests
resourceList.description: Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss our newest releases, Project Turpentine and RUM Speed Tests

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Saturday - Cloudflare Pages is Lightning Fast
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Pages is Lightning Fast
resourceList.description: With Cloudflare's extensive network, consisting of 250+ cities, your Pages site is deployed directly to the edge in seconds.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021 - Saturday - Profiling Your Workers with Wrangler
resourceList.resourceTitle: Profiling Your Workers with Wrangler
resourceList.description: To help measure performance of our customers' Workers, we're beginning to integrate with the Chrome DevTools protocol.

resourceList.title: Speed Week 2021- Sunday -
resourceList.resourceTitle: Project Myriagon: Cloudflare Passes 10,000 Connected Networks
resourceList.description: This is the culmination of a special project we've been working on for the last few months dubbed Project Myriagon, a reference to the 10,000-sided polygon of the same name.
